fields.value: Data and Stimuli for Darby, Castro, Wasserman, and Sloutsky article "Cognitive Flexibility and Memory in Pigeons, Human Children, and Adults" (Cognition, 2018).

dsDescriptionValue.value: The deposited contains data and stimuli information and ReadMe files for for Darby, Castro, Wasserman, and Sloutsky article "Cognitive Flexibility and Memory in Pigeons, Human Children, and Adults" (Cognition, 2018).

fields.value: This is Version 1.0 of the Dataverse. There are two files in this Dataverse: (1) ReadMe_Downloading Instructions.rtf and (2) Data and Materials.txt. Note that the second file is a zip file, so it should be downloaded and renamed. Please read the note for this file before attempting to open it.

files.description: This is a readme file that explains how to open the Stimuli and Data.txt file and how to read the data files. It also explains how data are organized.
files.label: readme.rtf

dataFile.description: This is a readme file that explains how to open the Stimuli and Data.txt file and how to read the data files. It also explains how data are organized.

files.description: Note that this is a zip (not text) file. To assess the file, downloaded it first. After that, please rename it by changing the extension from "txt" to "zip". Only after these steps, the file can be opened.
files.label: Stumuli and Data.txt

dataFile.description: Note that this is a zip (not text) file. To assess the file, downloaded it first. After that, please rename it by changing the extension from "txt" to "zip". Only after these steps, the file can be opened.
